promqlQuery.value: last_over_time((avg_over_time((avg(k8s_node_cpu_utilization_1{ k8s_cluster_name='onlineboutique'} / on (node_id) group_left () count(system_cpu_time_total{state="idle", k8s_cluster_name='onlineboutique'}) by (node_id)) without (host_id, host_type))[900s:]) * on (k8s_node_name) group_left () max(container_cpu_utilization_1{ k8s_cluster_name='onlineboutique', k8s_namespace_name='astronomy-demo'} > bool -1) by (k8s_node_name))[15m])

widgets.title: Count High Severity Logs By Service

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs
| filter $l.subsystemname != null && $l.subsystemname !='cx_rum'
| groupby $l.subsystemname as $d['subsystemname'] agg count() as $d['count']
source logs | groupby $l.subsystemname as subsystem agg count() as count

source logs 
// | limit 5 
| groupby  $l.applicationname as Application,$l.subsystemname as Subsystem agg count() as Count 
| orderby Application,Subsystem
| filter Subsystem !=null

widgets.title: Logs Count group by Subsystem name

dataprimeQuery.text:
source spans 
| groupby $l.subsystemName as subsystem agg avg(duration) as avg_duration
source logs | filter $m.severity != null | groupby $m.timestamp / 225s as $d['timestamp'], $m.severity as $d['severity'] agg count() as $d['count']
